title: War Brokers
description: A voxel-style first-person shooter with various vehicles and game modes. Engage in team battles, capture the flag, or battle royale modes with a unique blocky aesthetic. Features tanks, helicopters, and other vehicles alongside traditional FPS combat.
how_to_play: Use WASD to move, Space to jump, and Shift to sprint. Mouse to aim and left-click to shoot. Press E to enter vehicles, Q for special abilities. On mobile, use the virtual controls. Work with your team to complete objectives or be the last player standing in battle royale mode.
